block_comment: This code block assigns the values of three registers to three wires in Verilog RTL. The purpose of this block is to enable or disable the read data from the physical layer based on the values in phy_rddata_en_r1, phy_rddata_en_r2, and phy_rddata_en_r3. It carries out its function by using the 'assign' keyword to directly map the values of the registers to the wires, allowing for instantaneous updates to the wire values anytime the register values change.
